snippet: Thomas P. DiNapoli said Gov. Andrew M. Cuomo’s proposal depended on federal aid that might not materialize and counted on wage and job growth bringing big increases in tax revenues.
abstract: New York State Comptroller Thomas P DiNapoli questions parts of Gov Andrew M Cuomo's budget proposal, insisting that the spending plan relies heavily on optimistic projections and will likely burden the state with even greater debt.
lead_paragraph: Thomas P. DiNapoli said Gov. Andrew M. Cuomo’s proposal depended on federal aid that might not materialize and counted on wage and job growth bringing big increases in tax revenues.

headline.main: Comptroller Criticizes Budget Plan of Governor
headline.print_headline: Comptroller Criticizes Budget Plan Of Governor
